devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

params.newImplementation: Address of the new implementation contract.

devdoc.title: Rigoblock Pool Proxy Factory contract - allows creation of new Rigoblock pools.

PoolCreated(address).notice: Emitted when a new pool is created.

RegistryUpgraded(address).notice: Emitted when registry address is upgraded by the Rigoblock Dao.

Upgraded(address).notice: Emitted when a new implementation is set by the Rigoblock Dao.

getRegistry().notice: Returns the address of the pool registry.

implementation().notice: Returns the implementation address for the pool proxies.

parameters().notice: Returns the pool initialization parameters at proxy deploy.

setImplementation(address).notice: Allows Rigoblock Dao to update factory pool implementation.

setRegistry(address).notice: Allows owner to update the registry.
